lines.text: Hold it baby. How about giving us the Dance of the Two Veils?
You mean seven veils.
Why bother with preliminaries?
Ah, Egypt. Land of mystery. Home of the mighty fairies.
You mean pharaohs.
I know what I mean.
Excuse me, Commandant. There is a woman here for you.
A woman? But it's not Saturday, is it?
No, no not THAT woman.
You mean all these ladies are the Sheikh's wives?
Yes. What's so terrible about that?
Think, all those mothers in law!
Are you taking Le Pice?
Please sir, I'm trying to ask a serious question.
If you're going to kill us, why don't you just shoot us now and get it over with?
That is an EXCELLENT idea.
[Sgt. Nocker and Commandant Burger are checking the supplies]
Salt Tablets, The Pill... The Pill? What do you suppose they use that for?
I cannot conceive!

[after unveiling Sgt. Nocker as a fake, and he refuses his medal]
Nein, nein, nein!
Well one should be enough!
It has been truly said. The mind of the white infidel is like the action of the cleanser. Clean round the bend.
The Prophet has truly said. The behaviour of the white infidels is like blood coming from a stone. Bleedin' mystery.

[while on her way to Africa, different people coe to check something - though they actually have sex with her]
Thats a funny way to check my...
